SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.bbox.description: Vector of float, bbox coordinates of the extent in the order xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax
SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.bbox.label: bbox

SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.source.description: String, type of source to load the predictors from (either from tif, or from the stac catalogue)
SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.source.label: source

SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.collections_items.description: Vector of strings, collection name followed by '|' followed by item id
SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.collections_items.label: collections_items

SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.spatial_res.description: Integer, spatial resolution of the predictors
SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.spatial_res.label: spatial resolution

SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.mask.description: Shapefile, used to mask the output predictors
SDM>loadFromStac.yml@0.mask.label: mask

SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.method.description: Option, method used to compute collinearity between variables
SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.method.label: method

SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.method_cor_.description: Option, method to calculate the coefficient of collinearity, only used if method == vif.cor
SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.method_cor_.label: correlation coefficient for vif.cor method

SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.nb_sample.description: Integer, number of points to select to calculate collinearity
SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.nb_sample.label: nb sample

SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.cutoff_cor.description: Float, correlation cutoff (used with vif.cor, pearson spearman and kendall method)
SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.cutoff_cor.label: cutoff correlation

SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.cutoff_vif.description: Integer, VIF correlation cutoff (used with vif.step method)
SDM>removeCollinearity.yml@1.cutoff_vif.label: VIF correlation
